Name: ComputeNode
SummaryComment: Summarizes the state of a compute node.

Key.Name: Id
Key.SummaryComment: The id of compute node.

Key.Name: Url
Key.SummaryComment: The URL of compute node.

Key.Name: SchedulingState
Key.SummaryComment: Whether the node is available for task scheduling.

Key.Name: State
Key.SummaryComment: The current state of the compute node.

Key.Name: StateTransitionTime
Key.SummaryComment: The time at which the compute node entered the current state.

Key.Name: LastBootTime
Key.SummaryComment: The time at which the compute node was started.

Key.Name: AllocationTime
Key.SummaryComment: The time at which this compute node was allocated to the pool.

Key.Name: IPAddress
Key.SummaryComment: The IP address associated with the compute node.

Key.Name: AffinityId
Key.SummaryComment: An opaque string that contains information about the location of the compute node.

Key.Name: VirtualMachineSize
Key.SummaryComment: The size of the virtual machine hosting the compute node.

Key.Name: TotalTasksRun
Key.SummaryComment: The number of tasks that have been run on this compute node from the time it was allocated to this pool. This includes Job Preparation, Job Release, and Job Manager tasks, but not the pool start task.

Key.Name: TotalTasksSucceeded
Key.SummaryComment: The total number of tasks which completed successfully (with exitCode 0) on the compute node. This includes Job Preparation, Job Release, and Job Manager tasks, but not the pool start task.

Key.Name: RunningTasksCount
Key.SummaryComment: The total number of currently running tasks on the compute node. This includes Job Preparation, Job Release, and Job Manager tasks, but not the pool start task.

Key.Name: StartTaskInformation
Key.SummaryComment: The detailed runtime information of the start task, including current state, error details, exit code, start time, end time, etc.

Key.Name: RecentTasks
Key.SummaryComment: The execution information for the most recent tasks that ran on this compute node. Note that this element is only returned if at least one task was run on this compute node since the time it was assigned to its current pool.

Key.Name: StartTask
Key.SummaryComment: The start task associated with all compute nodes in this pool.

Key.Name: CertificateReferences
Key.SummaryComment: the list of certificates installed on this compute node.

Key.Name: Errors
Key.SummaryComment: The list of errors that are currently being encountered by the compute node.

Key.Name: IsDedicated
Key.SummaryComment: Whether this compute node is a dedicated node. If false, the node is a low-priority node.

Key.Name: EndpointConfiguration
Key.SummaryComment: The endpoint configuration for the compute node.

Key.Name: NodeAgentInformation
Key.SummaryComment: Information about the node agent version and the time the node upgraded to a new version.

Key.Name: RunningTaskSlotsCount
Key.SummaryComment: The total number of scheduling slots used by currently running Job Tasks on the Compute Node. This includes Job Manager Tasks and normal Tasks, but not Job Preparation, Job Release or Start Tasks.

Key.Name: VirtualMachineInfo
Key.SummaryComment: Info about the current state of the virtual machine.
